was dwelling in the Jeta Grove of AnÄthapiá¹‡á¸ada's Park in ÅšrÄvastÄ«,
together with a great assembly of 1,250 bhiká¹£us,

At that time, the TathÄgata said to the great assembly,
I recall that in the past,
I was dwelling north of the Himalayas, roaming in GandhamÄdana.
I saw a young girl,
whose body was adorned with the marks and characteristics of a hundred merits.ğŸ”½She wore deerskin as her clothing,
and used poisonous snakes as her necklace.
And bring poisonous insects, tigers, wolves, and lions.
Surrounding me in front and back, always as companions.
Drinking poisonous fruit juice and eating poisonous fruits and vegetables.
The girl saw me and said,
Listen to me, I will proclaim a great true mantra.
It can remove all poisons in the world.
If a person hears this mantra and thinks of my name,
They will not be harmed by any poisons.
At that time, the young girl spoke the mantra for me.
After I heard it,
I always held this mantra to benefit sentient beings.
I will now speak the true mantra, which goes:

TadyathÄ oá¹ƒ 1 á¹›mi 2 á¹›mi 3 á¹›mi 4 nu mi 5 nu mo 6 á¹›yi 7 nu tsi 8 nu tsa 9 á¹›yi 10 ge ka rani 11 va ga rani 12 ga Å›mi 13 ga Å›mi ra mu kti 14 a gyi 15 a ga ni 16 a ga na 17 ga ni 18 á¹›yi 19 á¹›yi 20 á¹›yi 21 a ka ya 22 á¹›yi 23 a pa ya 24 á¹›yi 25 Å›va tri 26 Å›va tra dun nai 27 a na nu ra ká¹£a sai va ha The Buddha said to the bhiká¹£us:
If a person hears this mantra once,
For the next seven years they will be far removed from all poisons.
If a person always keeps it in mind,
All poisonous insects and all poisonous substances will not be able to harm them.
If a poisonous snake comes to bite this person,
The snake will immediately rot and decay.
For those who uphold this mantra and its methods,
First offer white things to the teacher.
Then accept them, and the method will surely be accomplished.
Do not recite this mantra near a snake.
The snake will die immediately. After it dies, use the mantra to revive it, which goes:

TadyathÄ iri miri garami yajja khorÅ« khorÅ« khorÅ«na khorÅ«na garami ghnini gchata gchata yati sapta sapta yati nagarÄ« nagaraÅ›aka laá¹ƒdhiri icchÄ buddha Å›Ä«talapita tarasapta tarasapta sarpÄhaka If a person recites this once,
for a year, all poisons will not harm them.
If one can always uphold it, external poisons will be eliminated,
and the three internal poisons will also be removed.
If there is an outbreak of a bad sore, a back boil, or other illness,
spit on it and recite the mantra, and it will be cured.
If all evil beasts come,
just recite it seven times and they will pass by and not be able to harm you.
If you are poisoned,
Place it on the first joint of the middle finger.
Wrap the left and right hands around the wound.
Recite the mantra counterclockwise twenty-one times, and it will be cured.
Always recite it without speaking loudly.
If you speak loudly, there will be poisonous insects and you will surely die.
If a poisonous insect dies,
Untie it with this mantra and it will come back to life.
Recite it twenty-one times.
The mantra for unbinding poison says:
